job.title: Machine learning engineer - Perception
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtApple is looking for MLDeep Learning engineers to develop and integrate machine learning technologies for autonomous systems You will work on a hardwaresoftware product enabled by the ML technologies you buildltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtDevelop features and models to improve the capabilities of largescale Deep Learningbased systemsltbrgtltbrgtScale up models build training datasets and tune parameters to maximize system performanceltbrgtltbrgtBuild software that improves your rate of experimentation and helps you make better decisions about what to try nextltbrgtltbrgtWork with the team to deploy models in a mission critical environmentltbrgtltbrgtAble to train and debug deep learning systems Defining metrics and datasets performing error analysis training models in a modern DL framework such as TensorFlow PyTorch Keras etcltbrgtltbrgtFamiliar with current DL literature and the math of machine learning optimization methods common types of models and layers etcltbrgtltbrgtStrong background in Python development with Linux You write clean correct code while iterating on experiments in Python Ability to understand and contribute to Cbased software is a plusltbrgtltbrgtExcellent communication skills You collaborate effectively with other teams and communicate clearly about your workltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtWorking with the team youll join a fantastic team of hardworking engineers and researchers with deep experience in robotics machine learning and software engineering We hope youre excited about the values that drive usltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt  Passion for the mission Were here to make something great We take on whatever work is right for the product and strive for the best possible resultsltbrgtltbrgt  Modesty The right answer is more important than being right We search for solutions as a team and value cleareyed feedbackltbrgtltbrgt  Lean habits You cant grow without limits Time constraints and big goals inspire us to sharpen our focus and learn to make great decisionsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBachelors Masters or PhD Degree in Computer ScienceMachine Learning or equivalent professional experienceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtRole Number 200169370ltbrgtltbrgt
